Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Requires authorization for and verification of the validity of third-party charges for products and services billed to a customer on bills issued by telecommunications providers
Summary: Requires authorization by the customer, and verification by the telecommunications providers, of the validity of third-party charges for products and services billed to a customer on bills issued by telecommunication providers to their customers.
LawCode: Add ยง399-zzzzz, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring authorization by the customer, and verification by the telecommunications providers, of the validity of third-party charges for products and services billed to a customer on bills issued by telecommunications providers to their customers
